channel.title: PI Questions
channel.description:
How do I add barricades? In spots Don't want others to go.
Another question is.. When I try to edit shops it compiles ok but when I click to play it dosnt work! lol.

item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zachs Owner Zachs
item.description:
@Owner_Zachs wrote:

Lol…

item.title: PI Questions
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“Owner Zachs, post:5, topic:387444”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=483248.msg3539499#msg3539499 date=1300755842]
@objects

objectmanager.java

@shops

What do you mean?

You dont need to compile when editing a cfg file… and what do you mean when you click play it “doesnt work”?
[/quote]

shops i completed… But Can you explain more on objects like how to do it… And where to add stuff like that?

And how do i get doors open?[/quote]

You have a few choices

[ol][li]Kill your self[/li]
[li]Use Hyperion[/li][/ol]

To begin spawning objects, first open your ObjectManager class, located: src/server/world/ObjectManager.java. Search for "public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c)" the method for spawning objects goes in that void. The method is as follows. [code=Java] c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(OBJECT_ID, X_COORDINATE, Y_COORDINATE, FACE_ORIENTATION, OBJECT_TYPE); [/code]

#Facepalm

Read full topic
